overview: From 2025-09-07 to 2025-09-08, ethereum-optimism/specs had 1 new PRs (0 merged), 1 new issues, and 3 active contributors.

topIssues.title:
# Funded Builder Addresses

This file documents builder addresses that have received mainnet ETH funding for use in the OP Stack, testing, or builder onboarding.

| Address                                    | Amount (ETH) | Mainnet Block | Builder Name   | Notes                    |
|---------------------------------------------|--------------|---------------|---------------|--------------------------|
| 0x06EE840642a33367ee59fCA237F270d5119d1356 | 64           | 23311566      | Titan builder | Received 64 ETH funding. |
topIssues.author: ajit2903

topPRs.title: Safer Safes - Safe Extensions v2
topPRs.author: alcueca
topPRs.body: Specs for [LivenessModuleV2](https://github.com/ethereum-optimism/design-docs/pull/320) and [TimelockGuard](https://github.com/ethereum-optimism/design-docs/pull/324), combined into a single contract as **Safe Extensions V2**, replacing Safe Extensions.
